about.title: About Romanian Business Hub
about.seoTitle: About Us - Romanian Business Hub West Flanders
about.seoDescription: Learn about Romanian Business Hub, our mission to connect Romanian businesses with the local community in West Flanders, Belgium. Supporting Romanian entrepreneurs since 2025.
about.seoKeywords: about Romanian Business Hub, Romanian community Belgium, Romanian entrepreneurs West Flanders, Romanian business directory
about.missionText: The Romanian Business Hub is dedicated to promoting and supporting Romanian-owned businesses in West Flanders. Our platform connects these businesses with the local community, helping them increase their visibility and customer base while preserving and sharing Romanian culture and expertise.
about.buildingText1: Our vision is to create a comprehensive, easy-to-use directory of Romanian businesses across West Flanders. We want to make it simple for customers to find the authentic Romanian products and services they're looking for. The platform will feature detailed business profiles, contact information, and operating hours to connect you with the right businesses for your needs.
about.goal1: Showcase Romanian businesses to the wider community.
about.goal2: Help customers discover authentic Romanian products and services.
about.goal3: Support Romanian entrepreneurs in building successful businesses.
about.goal4: Foster strong connections within the Romanian-Belgian community.
about.goal5: Promote cultural exchange through business and community relationships.
about.storyText1: The idea for the Romanian Business Hub came from seeing the same questions asked over and over in community Facebook groups: "Can anyone recommend a good Romanian mechanic?" or "Where can I find the best authentic ingredients for the holidays?"
about.storyText2: I saw a clear need. While our community is full of talented entrepreneurs and skilled professionals, finding them was a challenge. Recommendations were scattered across countless posts and easily lost. I knew there had to be a better way to bring everyone together.
about.storyText3: That's why I decided to build the Romanian Business Hub. My goal is to create a single, central platform where every Romanian-owned business in West Flanders can be seen and where every customer can easily find them. It's about taking that powerful community spirit from social media and giving it a permanent, professional home.
about.joinTitle: Get Ready to Join Our Community
about.joinText1: We are preparing for our launch! Whether you're a Romanian business owner looking to increase your visibility or a customer seeking authentic products and services, we invite you to be part of our journey from the very beginning.
about.joinBusinessOwnersText: Get in touch to be one of the first businesses featured when we go live.
about.joinCustomersText: Sign up for our newsletter to be the first to know when the platform launches, so you can start exploring the best Romanian businesses in West Flanders.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.seoTitle: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions | Romanian Business Hub
faq.seoDescription: Find answers to common questions about listing your Romanian business, searching the directory, reviews, and more. Get help with the Romanian Business Hub platform.
faq.seoKeywords: Romanian business FAQ, business directory help, list business Belgium, Romanian services questions
faq.intro: Find answers to the most common questions about the Romanian Business Hub and how it can help you.
faq.q1: What is the Romanian Business Hub?
faq.a1: Romanian Business Hub is an online directory connecting Romanian-owned businesses in West Flanders with local customers. We aim to help people easily find Romanian services, products, and expertise in the region.
faq.q2: How can I add my business to the directory?
faq.a2: You can add your business by clicking on the "Add Your Business" link in the footer or navigation menu. You'll need to provide basic information about your business including name, address, contact details, category, and a brief description. Once submitted, we'll review your listing and publish it on approval.
faq.q3: Is this service only for Romanian-owned businesses?
faq.a3: Yes, our platform specifically focuses on businesses owned or operated by Romanians in West Flanders. This helps create a specialized community and resource for Romanian entrepreneurs and those seeking Romanian products or services.
faq.a4: Basic listings are completely free of charge. We also offer premium listing options with additional features such as highlighted placement, more photos, and extended business descriptions for a small fee.
faq.q5: How can I update my business information?
faq.a5: Once you've registered and created your business profile, you can log in at any time to update your information. If you encounter any difficulties, please contact our support team.
faq.q6: Can users leave reviews for businesses?
faq.a6: Yes, registered users can leave reviews and ratings for businesses they've used. This helps build trust within the community and provides valuable feedback to business owners.
faq.q7: How do I search for specific businesses?
faq.a7: You can search for businesses using the search bar at the top of the page. You can search by business name, category, or location. You can also browse businesses by category from our categories page.
faq.q8: I found incorrect information about a business. What should I do?
faq.a8: If you notice incorrect information about a business, please use our "Report an Issue" feature located on each business listing page. Our team will investigate and make necessary corrections.
faq.stillHaveQuestionsText: If you couldn't find the answer to your question, please don't hesitate to contact us directly.
